subject: Missing haptic motor, order SSN3533
description_text:
Hi there, I just received my 2nd package from order
SSN3533.  Across both packages I appear to have received everything besides
the 3rd VAM Pro motor from the 3 pack.  Photo 1 was the first package with
only 2 motors, the power unit, control box, and the directional braces for
throttle and brake.  The 2nd package had the handbrake only.  I worry that
the order was mid-packaged with only 2 motors instead of all 3.  The 2nd
photo shows the handbrake only as well as the first package with everything
removed.

Please help,
Peter

conversations.body_text: Hi Peter Krengel,    We apologise for the inconvenience and shall arrange for a replacement to be sent to you as soon as possible.

Id love the tracking number if and when available so I can anticipate when
to install the motor.

Thank you,
Peter
